video.title: CSS Shapes & Friends: upgrade your page layouts
video.description:
Web design is getting boring. Learn some cool new ways CSS can help you stand out such as CSS shapes.

This talk was given at JSOxford July 2018 by Nicky Thompson.

Checkout the JSOxford channel for more great talks: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCjXR8G5M-iwkHVF26AFFsCQ

This talk is under the creative commons license. freeCodeCamp is not associated with this talk. We're just excited to bring more exposure to to it!

--

Learn to code for free and get a developer job: https://www.freecodecamp.org

Read hundreds of articles on programming: https://medium.freecodecamp.org

topLevelComment.text: The public is louder than her :/
